channel.title: Whonix gateway allow connect to all internet
channel.description: Hi! I'm using whonix gateway on my windows 7. On windows 7 working only TOR browser internet but not working all traffic for example google.com. I suppose that whonix gateway firewall block it. How Can I allow traffic there?

item.title: Whonix gateway allow connect to all internet
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi kambin

I’m a little confused as to what you are asking. Are you:

  1. Using Whonix-Gateway to Torify your Windows-Whonix-Workstation and want to know why you can not connect to a site via clearnet ( i.e. not over Tor )
  2. Using Whonix-Gateway with Whonix-Workstation and you are not able to connect to specific sites over Tor.

Try to be as specific and as you can. The more information you give the better.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix gateway allow connect to all internet
